com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api

Class HttpsDebitCardService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api.AbstractCreditCardService
      • com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api.HttpsDebitCardService

  • public class HttpsDebitCardService
extends AbstractCreditCardService
    Builds the server calls for debit card transactions (purchase, refund, and batch close)

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpsDebitCardService

        public HttpsDebitCardService(int merchantId,
                     java.lang.String apiToken,
                     MarketSegment marketSegment,
                     java.lang.String url)
        Creates an instance. Secured by default.
        Parameters:
        merchant - the id of the merchant issuing the requests
        apiToken - the apiToken of the merchant issuing the requests
        marketSegment - the market segment of all requests. Not null.
        url - the gateway url to send requests to. Not null.

      • HttpsDebitCardService

        public HttpsDebitCardService(int merchantId,
                     java.lang.String apiToken,
                     MarketSegment marketSegment,
                     java.lang.String url,
                     boolean secured)
        Creates an instance.
        Parameters:
        merchant - the id of the merchant issuing the requests
        apiToken - the apiToken of the merchant issuing the requests
        marketSegment - the market segment of all requests. Not null.
        url - the gateway url to send requests to. Not null.
        secured - true if using https, otherwise http is used

      • HttpsDebitCardService

        public HttpsDebitCardService(int merchantId,
                     java.lang.String apiToken,
                     java.lang.String url)
        Creates an instance with default MarketSegment.INTERNET. Secured by default.
        Parameters:
        merchant - the id of the merchant issuing the requests
        apiToken - the apiToken of the merchant issuing the requests
        url - the gateway url to send requests to. Not null.
